taskDescription: When Streptococcus lactis (S. lactis) is in a milk culture at 37°C, the population of S. lactis doubles in number every 30 minutes. If the culture began with 15 organisms, how many S. lactis bacteria are present in the culture after 20 hours?
detailedSolution:
There are <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>1.6493</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>10</mn>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mn>13</mn>
      </mrow>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">1.6493 \times {10^{13}}</annotation></semantics></math> organisms after 20 hours.
